text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1660. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The speakers is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the HIDevolution MSI P65 Creator 9SD 15.6” FHD 144Hz | 2.6 GHz i7-9750H, GTX 1660 Ti, 16GB 2666MHz RAM, 512GB PCIe SSD | Authorized Performance Upgrades & 3-Year Warranty!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for streaming games is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1660. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The fan noise is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the HIDevolution MSI P65 Creator 9SD 15.6” FHD 144Hz | 2.6 GHz i7-9750H, GTX 1660 Ti, 16GB 2666MHz RAM, 512GB PCIe SSD | Authorized Performance Upgrades & 3-Year Warranty!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Elden Ring and Starfield. The build quality of the HIDevolution MSI P65 Creator 9SD 15.6” FHD 144Hz | 2.6 GHz i7-9750H, GTX 1660 Ti, 16GB 2666MHz RAM, 512GB PCIe SSD | Authorized Performance Upgrades & 3-Year Warranty is solid, and the keyboard is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Apex Legends and Elden Ring. The build quality of the HIDevolution MSI P65 Creator 9SD 15.6” FHD 144Hz | 2.6 GHz i7-9750H, GTX 1660 Ti, 16GB 2666MHz RAM, 512GB PCIe SSD | Authorized Performance Upgrades & 3-Year Warranty is solid, and the build material is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for AAA gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1660 in the HIDevolution MSI P65 Creator 9SD 15.6” FHD 144Hz | 2.6 GHz i7-9750H, GTX 1660 Ti, 16GB 2666MHz RAM, 512GB PCIe SSD | Authorized Performance Upgrades & 3-Year Warranty is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.
